setMethod("plot", "polygon",
          function(x, y, ...) {
                  plot(x@x, x@y, type = "n", ...)
                  xp <- c(x@x, x@x[1])
                  yp <- c(x@y, x@y[1])
                  lines(xp, yp)
	  })
